content: lion brand pattern # 40437-1 *cbcl-childsponchos pdf* published in crochet fantasy crochet magazine jo-ann simply creative crochet skill level easy level 2 size small medium large to fit chest 20 24 28 51 61 71 cm circumference 29½ 33 37 75 84 94 cm at lower edge length 7 9 11½ 18 23 29 cm lion® boucle article #930 *discontinued* 174 231 288 yards crochet hook - size n-13 9 mm split ring stitch markers gauge 6 5 single_crochet + 8 row = 4 \ 10 cm with mc on larger hook 6 5 sts + 4 row = 4 \ 10 cm in body pattern with mc on larger hook pattern v_stitch poncho design includes cuffs for ease of wear see also child s poncho #40437 1 *lion brand patterns are written in u s crochet terminology * *free registration at site required to access patterns * 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/childs-poncho-40437
